channel.title: Comments on: Chocolate Chip Stollen – Daring Bakers Challenge December 2010

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Yum Yum Yum! Your chocolate chip stollen looks marvelous!
item.content:encoded: Yum Yum Yum! Your chocolate chip stollen looks marvelous!

item.title: By: Cath@dunnntoperfection.blogspot.com
item.dc:creator: Cath@dunnntoperfection.blogspot.com
item.description: Oh!! - i wish I'd made a choccy version! Great idea! Looks delish!
item.content:encoded: Oh!! – i wish I’d made a choccy version! Great idea! Looks delish!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
Beautiful work!
I have to say, you have a beautiful blog, I am loving browsing through and looking at your photographs.
Can't wait to see what you do next challenge
item.content:encoded:
Beautiful work!

I have to say, you have a beautiful blog, I am loving browsing through and looking at your photographs.

Can’t wait to see what you do next challenge

item.title: By: Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description: Oh!! Chocolate Chip! I cant believe I didnt try this! Your stollen looks perfect and I will definitely try your version when the weather cools down. I hope you had a happy and safe christmas, well done! P.s. I am envious of your dessert menu, it sounds delicious!
item.content:encoded: Oh!! Chocolate Chip! I cant believe I didnt try this! Your stollen looks perfect and I will definitely try your version when the weather cools down. I hope you had a happy and safe christmas, well done! P.s. I am envious of your dessert menu, it sounds delicious!

item.title: By: Sarah
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.description: Your stollen looks beautiful! I didn't know that it could be made in a ring shape and its lovely to have the [very Anita inspired!] chocolate alternative to fruit :)
item.content:encoded: Your stollen looks beautiful! I didn’t know that it could be made in a ring shape and its lovely to have the [very Anita inspired!] chocolate alternative to fruit ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: It looks just gorgeous! Excellent work on this challenge, and it sounds like the perfect addition to all your holiday desserts. Have a fantastic New Year's!
item.content:encoded: It looks just gorgeous! Excellent work on this challenge, and it sounds like the perfect addition to all your holiday desserts. Have a fantastic New Year’s!

item.title: By: marcellina
item.dc:creator: marcellina
item.description: Your stollen looks fantastic! My choc version was a bit dry but yours looks very moist! Yes, we are having strange weather here in Oz. We were flooded in for Christmas! Happy New Year!
item.content:encoded: Your stollen looks fantastic! My choc version was a bit dry but yours looks very moist! Yes, we are having strange weather here in Oz. We were flooded in for Christmas! Happy New Year!

item.title: By: JennyBakes
item.dc:creator: JennyBakes
item.description: Your stollen looks beautiful. When I tried making a chocolate chip version, the warmth of the dough and my hands completely melted the chips into the dough, so I'm amazed at how clean yours looks. Happy new year!
item.content:encoded: Your stollen looks beautiful. When I tried making a chocolate chip version, the warmth of the dough and my hands completely melted the chips into the dough, so I’m amazed at how clean yours looks. Happy new year!

item.title: By: Suz
item.dc:creator: Suz
item.description: Yum! Your stollen looks wonderful. That sounds like a thoroughly delicious meal!
item.content:encoded: Yum! Your stollen looks wonderful. That sounds like a thoroughly delicious meal!

item.title: By: Jimena
item.dc:creator: Jimena
item.description: Your stollen turned out wonderful! I too loved this challenge and agree it tastes delicious toasted =)
item.content:encoded: Your stollen turned out wonderful! I too loved this challenge and agree it tastes delicious toasted =)
